4615 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4616 HRESULT ProcessInputBuffer(PaWasapiStream *stream, PaWasapiHostProcessor *processor)
4617 {
4618  HRESULT hr = S_OK;
4619  UINT32 frames;
4620  BYTE *data = NULL;
4621  DWORD flags = 0;
4622 
4623  for (;;)
4624  {
4625  // Check if blocking call must be interrupted
4626  if (WaitForSingleObject(stream->hCloseRequest, 0) != WAIT_TIMEOUT)
4627  break;
4628 
4629  // Findout if any frames available
4630  frames = 0;
4631  if ((hr = _PollGetInputFramesAvailable(stream, &frames)) != S_OK)
4632  return hr;
4633 
4634  // Empty/consumed buffer
4635  if (frames == 0)
4636  break;
4637 
4638  // Get the available data in the shared buffer.
4639  if ((hr = IAudioCaptureClient_GetBuffer(stream->captureClient, &data, &frames, &flags, NULL, NULL)) != S_OK)
4640  {
4641  if (hr == AUDCLNT_S_BUFFER_EMPTY)
4642  {
4643  hr = S_OK;
4644  break; // Empty/consumed buffer
4645  }
4646 
4647  return LogHostError(hr);
4648  break;
4649  }
4650 
4651  // Detect silence
4652  // if (flags & AUDCLNT_BUFFERFLAGS_SILENT)
4653  // data = NULL;
4654 
4655  // Process data
4656  if (stream->in.monoMixer != NULL)
4657  {
4658  // expand buffer
4659  UINT32 mono_frames_size = frames * (stream->in.wavex.Format.wBitsPerSample / 8);
4660  if (mono_frames_size > stream->in.monoBufferSize)
4661  stream->in.monoBuffer = PaWasapi_ReallocateMemory(stream->in.monoBuffer, (stream->in.monoBufferSize = mono_frames_size));
4662 
4663  // mix 1 to 2 channels
4664  stream->in.monoMixer(stream->in.monoBuffer, data, frames);
4665 
4666  // process
4667  processor[S_INPUT].processor((BYTE *)stream->in.monoBuffer, frames, NULL, 0, processor[S_INPUT].userData);
4668  }
4669  else
4670  {
4671  processor[S_INPUT].processor(data, frames, NULL, 0, processor[S_INPUT].userData);
4672  }
4673 
4674  // Release buffer
4675  if ((hr = IAudioCaptureClient_ReleaseBuffer(stream->captureClient, frames)) != S_OK)
4676  return LogHostError(hr);
4677 
4678  //break;
4679  }
4680 
4681  return hr;
4682 }

4684 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4685 void _StreamOnStop(PaWasapiStream *stream)
4686 {
4687  // Stop INPUT/OUTPUT clients
4688  if (!stream->bBlocking)
4689  {
4690  if (stream->in.clientProc != NULL)
4691  IAudioClient_Stop(stream->in.clientProc);
4692  if (stream->out.clientProc != NULL)
4693  IAudioClient_Stop(stream->out.clientProc);
4694  }
4695  else
4696  {
4697  if (stream->in.clientParent != NULL)
4698  IAudioClient_Stop(stream->in.clientParent);
4699  if (stream->out.clientParent != NULL)
4700  IAudioClient_Stop(stream->out.clientParent);
4701  }
4702 
4703  // Restore thread priority
4704  if (stream->hAvTask != NULL)
4705  {
4706  PaWasapi_ThreadPriorityRevert(stream->hAvTask);
4707  stream->hAvTask = NULL;
4708  }
4709 
4710  // Notify
4711  if (stream->streamRepresentation.streamFinishedCallback != NULL)
4712  stream->streamRepresentation.streamFinishedCallback(stream->streamRepresentation.userData);
4713 }

4715 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4716 PA_THREAD_FUNC ProcThreadEvent(void *param)
4717 {
4718  PaWasapiHostProcessor processor[S_COUNT];
4719  HRESULT hr;
4720  DWORD dwResult;
4721  PaWasapiStream *stream = (PaWasapiStream *)param;
4722  PaWasapiHostProcessor defaultProcessor;
4723  BOOL set_event[S_COUNT] = { FALSE, FALSE };
4724  BOOL bWaitAllEvents = FALSE;
4725  BOOL bThreadComInitialized = FALSE;
4726 
4727  /*
4728  If COM is already initialized CoInitialize will either return
4729  FALSE, or RPC_E_CHANGED_MODE if it was initialized in a different
4730  threading mode. In either case we shouldn't consider it an error
4731  but we need to be careful to not call CoUninitialize() if
4732  RPC_E_CHANGED_MODE was returned.
4733  */
4734  hr = CoInitializeEx(NULL, COINIT_APARTMENTTHREADED);
4735  if (FAILED(hr) && (hr != RPC_E_CHANGED_MODE))
4736  {
4737  PRINT(("WASAPI: failed ProcThreadEvent CoInitialize"));
4738  return paUnanticipatedHostError;
4739  }
4740  if (hr != RPC_E_CHANGED_MODE)
4741  bThreadComInitialized = TRUE;
4742 
4743  // Unmarshal stream pointers for safe COM operation
4744  hr = UnmarshalStreamComPointers(stream);
4745  if (hr != S_OK) {
4746  PRINT(("Error unmarshaling stream COM pointers. HRESULT: %i\n", hr));
4747  goto thread_end;
4748  }
4749 
4750  // Waiting on all events in case of Full-Duplex/Exclusive mode.
4751  if ((stream->in.clientProc != NULL) && (stream->out.clientProc != NULL))
4752  {
4753  bWaitAllEvents = (stream->in.shareMode == AUDCLNT_SHAREMODE_EXCLUSIVE) &&
4754  (stream->out.shareMode == AUDCLNT_SHAREMODE_EXCLUSIVE);
4755  }
4756 
4757  // Setup data processors
4758  defaultProcessor.processor = WaspiHostProcessingLoop;
4759  defaultProcessor.userData = stream;
4760  processor[S_INPUT] = (stream->hostProcessOverrideInput.processor != NULL ? stream->hostProcessOverrideInput : defaultProcessor);
4761  processor[S_OUTPUT] = (stream->hostProcessOverrideOutput.processor != NULL ? stream->hostProcessOverrideOutput : defaultProcessor);
4762 
4763  // Boost thread priority
4764  PaWasapi_ThreadPriorityBoost((void **)&stream->hAvTask, stream->nThreadPriority);
4765 
4766  // Create events
4767  if (stream->event[S_OUTPUT] == NULL)
4768  {
4769  stream->event[S_OUTPUT] = CreateEvent(NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL);
4770  set_event[S_OUTPUT] = TRUE;
4771  }
4772  if (stream->event[S_INPUT] == NULL)
4773  {
4774  stream->event[S_INPUT] = CreateEvent(NULL, FALSE, FALSE, NULL);
4775  set_event[S_INPUT] = TRUE;
4776  }
4777  if ((stream->event[S_OUTPUT] == NULL) || (stream->event[S_INPUT] == NULL))
4778  {
4779  PRINT(("WASAPI Thread: failed creating Input/Output event handle\n"));
4780  goto thread_error;
4781  }
4782 
4783  // Initialize event & start INPUT stream
4784  if (stream->in.clientProc)
4785  {
4786  // Create & set handle
4787  if (set_event[S_INPUT])
4788  {
4789  if ((hr = IAudioClient_SetEventHandle(stream->in.clientProc, stream->event[S_INPUT])) != S_OK)
4790  {
4791  LogHostError(hr);
4792  goto thread_error;
4793  }
4794  }
4795 
4796  // Start
4797  if ((hr = IAudioClient_Start(stream->in.clientProc)) != S_OK)
4798  {
4799  LogHostError(hr);
4800  goto thread_error;
4801  }
4802  }
4803 
4804  // Initialize event & start OUTPUT stream
4805  if (stream->out.clientProc)
4806  {
4807  // Create & set handle
4808  if (set_event[S_OUTPUT])
4809  {
4810  if ((hr = IAudioClient_SetEventHandle(stream->out.clientProc, stream->event[S_OUTPUT])) != S_OK)
4811  {
4812  LogHostError(hr);
4813  goto thread_error;
4814  }
4815  }
4816 
4817  // Preload buffer before start
4818  if ((hr = ProcessOutputBuffer(stream, processor, stream->out.framesPerBuffer)) != S_OK)
4819  {
4820  LogHostError(hr);
4821  goto thread_error;
4822  }
4823 
4824  // Start
4825  if ((hr = IAudioClient_Start(stream->out.clientProc)) != S_OK)
4826  {
4827  LogHostError(hr);
4828  goto thread_error;
4829  }
4830 
4831  }
4832 
4833  // Signal: stream running
4834  stream->running = TRUE;
4835 
4836  // Notify: thread started
4837  SetEvent(stream->hThreadStart);
4838 
4839  // Processing Loop
4840  for (;;)
4841  {
4842  // 10 sec timeout (on timeout stream will auto-stop when processed by WAIT_TIMEOUT case)
4843  dwResult = WaitForMultipleObjects(S_COUNT, stream->event, bWaitAllEvents, 10*1000);
4844 
4845  // Check for close event (after wait for buffers to avoid any calls to user
4846  // callback when hCloseRequest was set)
4847  if (WaitForSingleObject(stream->hCloseRequest, 0) != WAIT_TIMEOUT)
4848  break;
4849 
4850  // Process S_INPUT/S_OUTPUT
4851  switch (dwResult)
4852  {
4853  case WAIT_TIMEOUT: {
4854  PRINT(("WASAPI Thread: WAIT_TIMEOUT - probably bad audio driver or Vista x64 bug: use paWinWasapiPolling instead\n"));
4855  goto thread_end;
4856  break; }
4857 
4858  // Input stream
4859  case WAIT_OBJECT_0 + S_INPUT: {
4860 
4861  if (stream->captureClient == NULL)
4862  break;
4863 
4864  if ((hr = ProcessInputBuffer(stream, processor)) != S_OK)
4865  {
4866  LogHostError(hr);
4867  goto thread_error;
4868  }
4869 
4870  break; }
4871 
4872  // Output stream
4873  case WAIT_OBJECT_0 + S_OUTPUT: {
4874 
4875  if (stream->renderClient == NULL)
4876  break;
4877 
4878  if ((hr = ProcessOutputBuffer(stream, processor, stream->out.framesPerBuffer)) != S_OK)
4879  {
4880  LogHostError(hr);
4881  goto thread_error;
4882  }
4883 
4884  break; }
4885  }
4886  }
4887 
4888 thread_end:
4889 
4890  // Process stop
4891  _StreamOnStop(stream);
4892 
4893  // Release unmarshaled COM pointers
4894  ReleaseUnmarshaledComPointers(stream);
4895 
4896  // Cleanup COM for this thread
4897  if (bThreadComInitialized == TRUE)
4898  CoUninitialize();
4899 
4900  // Notify: not running
4901  stream->running = FALSE;
4902 
4903  // Notify: thread exited
4904  SetEvent(stream->hThreadExit);
4905 
4906  return 0;
4907 
4908 thread_error:
4909 
4910  // Prevent deadlocking in Pa_StreamStart
4911  SetEvent(stream->hThreadStart);
4912 
4913  // Exit
4914  goto thread_end;
4915 }
4916 
4917 // ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
4918 PA_THREAD_FUNC ProcThreadPoll(void *param)
4919 {
4920  PaWasapiHostProcessor processor[S_COUNT];
4921  HRESULT hr;
4922  PaWasapiStream *stream = (PaWasapiStream *)param;
4923  PaWasapiHostProcessor defaultProcessor;
4924  INT32 i;
4925  ThreadIdleScheduler scheduler;
4926 
4927  // Calculate the actual duration of the allocated buffer.
4928  DWORD sleep_ms = 0;
4929  DWORD sleep_ms_in;
4930  DWORD sleep_ms_out;
4931 
4932  BOOL bThreadComInitialized = FALSE;
4933 
4934  /*
4935  If COM is already initialized CoInitialize will either return
4936  FALSE, or RPC_E_CHANGED_MODE if it was initialized in a different
4937  threading mode. In either case we shouldn't consider it an error
4938  but we need to be careful to not call CoUninitialize() if
4939  RPC_E_CHANGED_MODE was returned.
4940  */
4941  hr = CoInitializeEx(NULL, COINIT_APARTMENTTHREADED);
4942  if (FAILED(hr) && (hr != RPC_E_CHANGED_MODE))
4943  {
4944  PRINT(("WASAPI: failed ProcThreadPoll CoInitialize"));
4945  return paUnanticipatedHostError;
4946  }
4947  if (hr != RPC_E_CHANGED_MODE)
4948  bThreadComInitialized = TRUE;
4949 
4950  // Unmarshal stream pointers for safe COM operation
4951  hr = UnmarshalStreamComPointers(stream);
4952  if (hr != S_OK)
4953  {
4954  PRINT(("Error unmarshaling stream COM pointers. HRESULT: %i\n", hr));
4955  return 0;
4956  }
4957 
4958  // Calculate timeout for next polling attempt.
4959  sleep_ms_in = GetFramesSleepTime(stream->in.framesPerHostCallback/WASAPI_PACKETS_PER_INPUT_BUFFER, stream->in.wavex.Format.nSamplesPerSec);
4960  sleep_ms_out = GetFramesSleepTime(stream->out.framesPerBuffer, stream->out.wavex.Format.nSamplesPerSec);
4961 
4962  // WASAPI Input packets tend to expire very easily, let's limit sleep time to 2 milliseconds
4963  // for all cases. Please propose better solution if any.
4964  if (sleep_ms_in > 2)
4965  sleep_ms_in = 2;
4966 
4967  // Adjust polling time for non-paUtilFixedHostBufferSize. Input stream is not adjustable as it is being
4968  // polled according its packet length.
4969  if (stream->bufferMode != paUtilFixedHostBufferSize)
4970  {
4971  //sleep_ms_in = GetFramesSleepTime(stream->bufferProcessor.framesPerUserBuffer, stream->in.wavex.Format.nSamplesPerSec);
4972  sleep_ms_out = GetFramesSleepTime(stream->bufferProcessor.framesPerUserBuffer, stream->out.wavex.Format.nSamplesPerSec);
4973  }
4974 
4975  // Choose smallest
4976  if ((sleep_ms_in != 0) && (sleep_ms_out != 0))
4977  sleep_ms = min(sleep_ms_in, sleep_ms_out);
4978  else
4979  {
4980  sleep_ms = (sleep_ms_in ? sleep_ms_in : sleep_ms_out);
4981  }
4982  // Make sure not 0, othervise use ThreadIdleScheduler
4983  if (sleep_ms == 0)
4984  {
4985  sleep_ms_in = GetFramesSleepTimeMicroseconds(stream->in.framesPerHostCallback/WASAPI_PACKETS_PER_INPUT_BUFFER, stream->in.wavex.Format.nSamplesPerSec);
4986  sleep_ms_out = GetFramesSleepTimeMicroseconds(stream->bufferProcessor.framesPerUserBuffer, stream->out.wavex.Format.nSamplesPerSec);
4987 
4988  // Choose smallest
4989  if ((sleep_ms_in != 0) && (sleep_ms_out != 0))
4990  sleep_ms = min(sleep_ms_in, sleep_ms_out);
4991  else
4992  {
4993  sleep_ms = (sleep_ms_in ? sleep_ms_in : sleep_ms_out);
4994  }
4995 
4996  // Setup thread sleep scheduler
4997  ThreadIdleScheduler_Setup(&scheduler, 1, sleep_ms/* microseconds here */);
4998  sleep_ms = 0;
4999  }
5000 
5001  // Setup data processors
5002  defaultProcessor.processor = WaspiHostProcessingLoop;
5003  defaultProcessor.userData = stream;
5004  processor[S_INPUT] = (stream->hostProcessOverrideInput.processor != NULL ? stream->hostProcessOverrideInput : defaultProcessor);
5005  processor[S_OUTPUT] = (stream->hostProcessOverrideOutput.processor != NULL ? stream->hostProcessOverrideOutput : defaultProcessor);
5006 
5007  // Boost thread priority
5008  PaWasapi_ThreadPriorityBoost((void **)&stream->hAvTask, stream->nThreadPriority);
5009 
5010  // Initialize event & start INPUT stream
5011  if (stream->in.clientProc)
5012  {
5013  if ((hr = IAudioClient_Start(stream->in.clientProc)) != S_OK)
5014  {
5015  LogHostError(hr);
5016  goto thread_error;
5017  }
5018  }
5019 
5020  // Initialize event & start OUTPUT stream
5021  if (stream->out.clientProc)
5022  {
5023  // Preload buffer (obligatory, othervise ->Start() will fail), avoid processing
5024  // when in full-duplex mode as it requires input processing as well
5025  if (!PA_WASAPI__IS_FULLDUPLEX(stream))
5026  {
5027  UINT32 frames = 0;
5028  if ((hr = _PollGetOutputFramesAvailable(stream, &frames)) == S_OK)
5029  {
5030  if (stream->bufferMode == paUtilFixedHostBufferSize)
5031  {
5032  if (frames >= stream->out.framesPerBuffer)
5033  {
5034  frames = stream->out.framesPerBuffer;
5035 
5036  if ((hr = ProcessOutputBuffer(stream, processor, frames)) != S_OK)
5037  {
5038  LogHostError(hr); // not fatal, just log
5039  }
5040  }
5041  }
5042  else
5043  {
5044  if (frames != 0)
5045  {
5046  if ((hr = ProcessOutputBuffer(stream, processor, frames)) != S_OK)
5047  {
5048  LogHostError(hr); // not fatal, just log
5049  }
5050  }
5051  }
5052  }
5053  else
5054  {
5055  LogHostError(hr); // not fatal, just log
5056  }
5057  }
5058 
5059  // Start
5060  if ((hr = IAudioClient_Start(stream->out.clientProc)) != S_OK)
5061  {
5062  LogHostError(hr);
5063  goto thread_error;
5064  }
5065  }
5066 
5067  // Signal: stream running
5068  stream->running = TRUE;
5069 
5070  // Notify: thread started
5071  SetEvent(stream->hThreadStart);
5072 
5073  if (!PA_WASAPI__IS_FULLDUPLEX(stream))
5074  {
5075  // Processing Loop
5076  UINT32 next_sleep = sleep_ms;
5077  while (WaitForSingleObject(stream->hCloseRequest, next_sleep) == WAIT_TIMEOUT)
5078  {
5079  // Get next sleep time
5080  if (sleep_ms == 0)
5081  {
5082  next_sleep = ThreadIdleScheduler_NextSleep(&scheduler);
5083  }
5084 
5085  for (i = 0; i < S_COUNT; ++i)
5086  {
5087  // Process S_INPUT/S_OUTPUT
5088  switch (i)
5089  {
5090  // Input stream
5091  case S_INPUT: {
5092 
5093  if (stream->captureClient == NULL)
5094  break;
5095 
5096  if ((hr = ProcessInputBuffer(stream, processor)) != S_OK)
5097  {
5098  LogHostError(hr);
5099  goto thread_error;
5100  }
5101 
5102  break; }
5103 
5104  // Output stream
5105  case S_OUTPUT: {
5106 
5107  UINT32 frames;
5108  if (stream->renderClient == NULL)
5109  break;
5110 
5111  // get available frames
5112  if ((hr = _PollGetOutputFramesAvailable(stream, &frames)) != S_OK)
5113  {
5114  LogHostError(hr);
5115  goto thread_error;
5116  }
5117 
5118  // output
5119  if (stream->bufferMode == paUtilFixedHostBufferSize)
5120  {
5121  while (frames >= stream->out.framesPerBuffer)
5122  {
5123  if ((hr = ProcessOutputBuffer(stream, processor, stream->out.framesPerBuffer)) != S_OK)
5124  {
5125  LogHostError(hr);
5126  goto thread_error;
5127  }
5128 
5129  frames -= stream->out.framesPerBuffer;
5130  }
5131  }
5132  else
5133  {
5134  if (frames != 0)
5135  {
5136  if ((hr = ProcessOutputBuffer(stream, processor, frames)) != S_OK)
5137  {
5138  LogHostError(hr);
5139  goto thread_error;
5140  }
5141  }
5142  }
5143 
5144  break; }
5145  }
5146  }
5147  }
5148  }
5149  else
5150  {
5151 #if 0
5152  // Processing Loop
5153  while (WaitForSingleObject(stream->hCloseRequest, 1) == WAIT_TIMEOUT)
5154  {
5155  UINT32 i_frames = 0, i_processed = 0;
5156  BYTE *i_data = NULL, *o_data = NULL, *o_data_host = NULL;
5157  DWORD i_flags = 0;
5158  UINT32 o_frames = 0;
5159

5226  {

5411 
5412  // Process stop
5413  _StreamOnStop(stream);
5414 
5415  // Release unmarshaled COM pointers
5416  ReleaseUnmarshaledComPointers(stream);
5417 
5418  // Cleanup COM for this thread
5419  if (bThreadComInitialized == TRUE)
5420  CoUninitialize();
5421 
5422  // Notify: not running
5423  stream->running = FALSE;
5424 
5425  // Notify: thread exited
5426  SetEvent(stream->hThreadExit);
5427 
5428  return 0;
5429 
5430 thread_error:
5431 
5432  // Prevent deadlocking in Pa_StreamStart
5433  SetEvent(stream->hThreadStart);
5434 
5435  // Exit
5436  goto thread_end;
5437 }
